name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

jollyRoger.description: Skull with flame-like hair and a thermometer through it
jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents Don Accino's heat-based powers and the family's unity

keyMoments.title: Twins' Magnetic Combination Play Revealed
keyMoments.description: Campacino and Brindo demonstrate the Accino Family's unique combat techniques based on familial bonds.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the family's relationships translate into combat abilities.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Jolly Roger Presented to Don Accino
keyMoments.description: Don Accino receives the stolen Straw Hat flag, adding it to his collection and revealing his bounty hunting operation.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's primary motivation and their conflict with the Straw Hats.

description: A family-based bounty hunting organization led by Don Accino. They operate in Hyōkaido, using the frozen region to trap pirates before capturing them for their bounties. The family is known for collecting pirate flags as trophies.

jollyRoger.description: Skull and crossbones with purple wings, claws, and a fire emblem behind a phoenix symbol
jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents rebirth and the crew's journey from defeat to redemption

keyMoments.title: Puzzle Offers Himself as Ransom
keyMoments.description: Captain Puzzle demonstrates the crew's changed philosophy by offering himself in exchange for his crew's freedom.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's evolution from traditional pirates to a more honorable group.

goals: Redeem themselves after New World defeat
description: A pirate crew led by Puzzle who previously attempted to sail through the New World but retreated to Paradise after their first mate Vigaro's death. They've been captured by the Accino Family and had their flag stolen, leading them to ally with the Straw Hat Pirates.

jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents Luffy's dream and the crew's identity

keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Jolly Roger Presented to Don Accino
keyMoments.description: The crew's stolen flag is revealed in Don Accino's collection, providing the emotional catalyst for the arc's climax.
keyMoments.significance: The theft of their most precious symbol drives the crew's determination to defeat the Accino Family.

goals: Continue journey to find One Piece
description: The protagonist pirate crew pursuing their dreams. In this arc, they're separated and fighting to recover their stolen flag from the Accino Family.
